backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing human-written summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with meta tags and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Sections/AboutSe: About section showing company description, highlights list, and a 15+ years stats card.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Contact: Contact section with validation-enabled form, contact info, and business hours.
frontend/src/components/Sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background image, intro text, and buttons scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Service: Services grid rendering cards using icons mapped from service IDs.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with company info, quick links, service list, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo, responsive navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Defines all marketing copy for the site, including hero text, about section, and detailed service descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no backend queries for the static marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables defining the site's construction-themed light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and utilities using the custom OKLCH theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, known issues, and current website features for PATIL Construction.
